statements: DELETE FROM purchase_orders WHERE vendor_id = 201 AND order_date = '2022-01-10';
DELETE FROM purchase_orders WHERE id = 100 AND vendor_id = 1;
DELETE FROM vendors WHERE vendor_name = 'Company XYZ' AND vendor_phone = '(123) 456-7890';
DELETE FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id IN (SELECT vendor_id FROM items WHERE item_price > 100);
DELETE FROM vendors WHERE vendor_name = 'ABC Company';
DELETE FROM purchase_orders WHERE id = 100 AND total_amount > 500.00;
DELETE FROM vendors WHERE vendor_name = 'Sample Vendor' OR email = 'sample@example.com';
